titleStmt.title: A short history of the last Parliament
titleStmt.author: Blackmore, Richard, Sir, d. 1729.
Drake, James, 1667-1707.

notesStmt.note: Written by Richard Blackmore. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Wrongly ascribed to James Drake, M.D. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
